display.title: Advanced Energy Detector
description: The &&aAdvanced Energy Detector&&r is an RS-latch for Energy Control.
Slap it on a &&3Battery Buffer&&r, set a Minimum EU near 0, and a Maximum EU near the max capacity.
The Cover will output a &&4Redstone&&r signal until the high threshold is reached, and then it will wait until the low threshold is reached to output redstone again.
This is a must to automate inertia-based power generators such as Boilers, or more importantly &&3Large Turbines&&r.
